tech_stack.viral_method: VisionClaw (Open Source Project) or WhatsApp Bridge
visionclaw_stack: Gemini Live API (WebSocket) for real-time video/audio
whatsapp_bridge_stack: WhatsApp Business API (via Twilio or Meta)
Contact named 'Ace' or 'AI' in phone book

streamlining_process.visionclaw: Real-time streaming. No manual sharing required. The app runs in background and listens/watches continuously.
streamlining_process.whatsapp_method: Voice Command: 'Hey Meta, send a photo to Ace.' (Native Meta integration). This is the smoothest official path.
streamlining_process.ios_shortcuts: Create a shortcut 'Send to Sight' that accepts an image and POSTs to OpenClaw webhook. Workflow: 'Hey Meta, take a photo' -> Share -> Tap Shortcut.

recommendation.immediate_action: Set up the Telegram/WhatsApp bridge in OpenClaw. This allows the 'Hey Meta, send photo to Ace' workflow immediately without custom app development.
recommendation.advanced_path: Investigate 'VisionClaw' GitHub repo for real-time video streaming capabilities if low-latency visual assistance is needed.
